markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sense-Dulling Hood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1944)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 54 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Sometimes, an enemy's dangerous special ability makes relatively standard sensory capabilities a liability. From [otyugh](/Monsters.aspx?ID=327) stench to a [harpy's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=258) song, plenty of creatures use their prey's senses against them. A sense-dulling hood is a wide, single-use mask designed to be pulled from an airtight package and slipped over the head. The mask grants you an item bonus to saving throws against [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246), and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) effects for a time, according to the mask's type. Since it dulls your senses without depriving you of them, the mask also imposes a –1 penalty to rolls and checks using Perception for the same duration.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sense-Dulling Hood (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 54 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 40 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2, and the duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sense-Dulling Hood (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 54 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +4, and the duration is 1 hour.
name: Sense-Dulling Hood
